name: Success-full
description:
What does it take to be successful?

Success-Full is a short incremental(?) excel game where you experience the easiest success  of your life.

***Note: 

The game uses excel macros for the interactions. So after you download the file:

1. Right click the excel file and select "Properties".

2. At the bottom of General, select "Unlock" and hit "OK".

3. Open the file, and around the top, select "enable content" if prompted.
